channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic light timing too short, 11th April
item.description:
The lights to let traffic from the A417 at the Elmbridge roundabout are set far too short, only 15 seconds at most, and let a few cars out at a time. In comparison the lights to let a single lane of cars into Longlevens are given twice that, despite the road always being congested to the roundabout. This is causing tailbacks to the turning for the Nuffield gym and consequently 30 minute delays. This is unacceptable.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Green or amber traffic light is not working

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 11th April
item.description:
email rec 28/03/2024 - There is a tree uprooted and dangerously hanging over the upper traffic calming area at the top of Greenway Lane. The road is still passable but with the high winds expected this afternoon it is likely to fall, blocking the road as a bare minimum or worse if an unsuspecting car or pedestrian is passing.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New lights at Hare and Hounds not working properly, 11th April
item.description:
The Innsworth Lane and Parton Road lights do not go at the same time. Innsworth Lane is red and Parton Road is green. Then it's switched so Parton Road red and Innsworth Lane green.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole around drain on road outside Twelve Bells, 11th April

item.title: Opposite my house, 11th April
item.description:

item.title: Multiple potholes in middle of road, 11th April
item.description:

item.title: Deep vertical pothole, 11th April
item.description:
